Record.ClassificationPath: Chemicals_and_Drugs_Kind/Drug, Food, Chemical or Biomedical Material/Pharmacologic Substance/Radiopharmaceutical Compound/Radioconjugate/In 111 Folic Acid
Record.BroaderTerm: Drug, Food, Chemical or Biomedical Material
Record.Description: A radioimmunoconjugate of folic acid labeled with indium 111 (In-111) with immunotherapeutic property. In 111 Folic Acid emits gamma radiation and X-Ray photons that can be captured by gamma camera allowing imaging of tumor cells that express folate receptors.
